title: Sell Murray McDavid Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Murray McDavid Whisky | Mission Gold & Celtic Heartlands | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Murray McDavid whisky. We buy the Mission Gold, Celtic Heartlands (Jim McEwan), and rare vintage releases.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Celtic Heartlands and Mission Gold.
introParagraph: Founded by Mark Reynier (Bruichladdich), Murray McDavid is famous for innovative ACE (Additional Cask Enhancement) finishes. The older 'Celtic Heartlands' decanters are prestigious.
whatWeBuy: Murray McDavid Celtic Heartlands (Bowmore, Highland Park)
photoChecklist: Back label for Cask Finish info
conditionFactors: Series: Celtic Heartlands bottles are large decanters. Stoppers are fragile.
Finish: Check the wine finish details (e.g. Chateau Latour finish).
Tin: Mission Gold tins dent easily.
Provenance: Jim McEwan era bottles are prized.
pricingFactors: Jim McEwan: Bottles from the era when the Bruichladdich team ran it are key.
Celtic Heartlands: The Bowmore 1968 is a superstar bottle.
Closed Distillery: They bottled rare Linlithgow and Lochside.
Wine Finish: First growth wine finishes add curiosity value.

faqs.question: What is Celtic Heartlands?
faqs.answer: A luxury series of high-age single malts (Bowmore, Macallan, Highland Park) packaged in decanters.

faqs.question: Do you buy the wine finished ones?
faqs.answer: Yes, Murray McDavid pioneered this. We look for them.

faqs.question: What is Mission Gold?
faqs.answer: Their premier single cask range (gold label/tin). We buy these.

faqs.question: Do you buy Benchmark?
faqs.answer: Yes, their core range single malts.

faqs.question: Who owns them now?
faqs.answer: Aceo Ltd bought them in 2013. We buy both eras.

faqs.question: How do I ship the decanter?
faqs.answer: Very carefully. Tape the stopper down.
